name: Cosmic Aliens
description:
This is the original Cosmic Aliens for MS-DOS that was circulated through modem dial-up bulletin board systems of the late 80's.  This was the last official public release of the original game, which, until only  a few years ago was presumed lost forever.

It runs in MS-DOS and won't run on a modern computer, so either a vintage PC running between say round 4-8 MHz or use the DOS BOX emulator manually throttled down to about 800 CPU cycles. 

Included in the ZIP file are the executable game with in game instructions, a readme file, and a few utilities used to speed up the keyboard and screen output of old MS-DOS based systems that were helpful back in the day.

I hope you like it, send your feedback to ogStevieStrow@gmail.com

To track the past, present, and future of this project, visit http://cosmicaliens.com
